title: Cultivating Wisdom with Vervaeke and the Circling Institute
description:
This video describes a new course that Guy Sengstock and I will be teaching that integrates circling, philosophical fellowship, and dialectic into dialogos. 

Link to Facebook page description of the course:https://www.facebook.com/events/berkeley-ca/dia-logos-the-circling-method-online-july-24-25/348220303480355/


Description info for course: 

10AM-4PM PST (Sat&Sun) July 24th and 25th
Tuition: $250 or $195 if paid by July 10
Reserve Your Spot!
To Register...
paypal.me/circling/195
or
paypal.me/circling/250
We will send you the Zoom link after payment is received.
(Download Zoom in advance at https://zoom.us/).

Credits for music
[Solace] by Scott Buckley – www.scottbuckley.com.au
